# 魔法防御术

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mofa-fangyushu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mofa-fangyushu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mofa-fangyushu
mofa-fangyushu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mofa-fangyushu
mofa-fangyushu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
